trigger_prototype.name: Gluster: Peer {#PEERNAME} has change the status
Gluster: Volume {#VOLNAME} has change the status

trigger_prototype.expression: (({Template App Gluster:glusix[volume_status, {#VOLNAME}, inodes, free].min(#5)}*100)/({Template App Gluster:glusix[volume_status, {#VOLNAME}, inodes, total].last()}))<10
trigger_prototype.name: Gluster: Volume {#VOLNAME} is running out of free inodes

trigger_prototype.expression: (({Template App Gluster:glusix[volume_status, {#VOLNAME}, size, free].min(#5)}*100)/({Template App Gluster:glusix[volume_status, {#VOLNAME}, size, total].last()}))<5
trigger_prototype.name: Gluster: Volume {#VOLNAME} is running out of free space
